EmailTemplate.description: Manfacturers of DuPont™ Nomex® Felted and Filtration Fabrics
EmailTemplate.name: DPS- Manufacturers of DuPont™ Nomex® Felted and Filtration Fabrics
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex® Felted and Filtration Fabrics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex®.
DuPont manufacturers Nomex® short fibers. We have customers that take the Nomex® short fibers to make Nomex® filtration products.
Tex Tech Industries P.O. Box 8, Main Street North Monmouth, ME 04265 800-441-7089 207-933-4404 207-933-9255 www.textechindustries.com
Albarrie Canada Ltd 85 Morrow Road Barrie, ON Canada, L4N 3V7 (866) 269-8275 www.albarrie.com
Southern Felt 1695 Edgefield Rd. North Augusta, SC 29860 (800) 633-7443 www.southernfelt.com
(To view the web address, please copy and paste the web address into your web browser.)
Please continue to visit out DuPont websites which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
